original_text: At that time, I will make a promise that nothing will hurt my people. I will make an agreement with the wild animals, with the birds in the fields and with the animals that move along the ground. I will remove from their land all the weapons that soldiers use to fight wars. I will destroy their swords and their bows and arrows. I will allow my people to live safely in peace.
korean_text: 그 날에는 내가 그들을 위하여 들짐승과 공중의 새와 땅의 곤충과 더불어 언약을 맺으며 또 이 땅에서 활과 칼을 꺾어 전쟁을 없이하고 그들로 평안히 눕게 하리라

sentences.original_text: At that time, I will make a promise
that nothing will hurt my people
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 내 백성을 해치지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will make an agreement with the wild animals
with the birds in the fields
and with the animals that move along the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅을 기어다니는 동물들과도 언약을 맺을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will remove from their land all the weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 땅에서 모든 무기를 제거할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that soldiers use to fight wars

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 활과 화살도 파괴할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will allow my people to live safely in peace
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성이 평안 안에서 안전하게 살도록 허락할 것입니다
